name: Segmented Hyper-Graphic
summary: Learn about .SHG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SHG files are compiled by Windows Help File Compiler (hc.exe) and are referenced by Microsoft WinHelp. They should not be opened manually.

description: Bitmap image containing "hotspots" used by Microsoft WinHelp; certain areas of the image can be clicked to jump to other help topics; similar to a Web image that uses a .MAP file to define clickable areas.
